question: [Rapid] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (141, 208), (124, 92), (125, 146), (104, 45).

qas.question: [Rapid] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (141, 208), (124, 92), (125, 146), (104, 45).
[Rapid] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (141, 208), (124, 92), (125, 146), (104, 45). Respond only with the area.
[Rapid] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (141, 208), (124, 92), (125, 146), (104, 45). Respond only with the number of vertices.
